name: Planet Pain: Hyper-Conflict
description:
Planet Pain: Hyper-Conflict for the Personal Computer is a high-octane action party game fit for 2-4 players. Engage in grand interplanetary battles through this very serious and very cool planet simulator.

Planet Pain: Hyper-Conflict combines everything you didn't ask for: Pool, Bumper Cars, Arbitrary Mini-Games, and an over-saturated Space Genre. Challenge enemies, make friends, or fool around; the possibilities are finite!

Included:

  • 2-4 Player Support!
  • 6 Mini-Game Types with 30+ Variations!
  • 24 Obtainable Items and Game Rules To Keep Things Fresh!
  • 9 Planets With Their Own Sizes and Designs!

For more stuff that is made, check out my tweeter!

Special thanks to:

Grahm Nesbitt - Music!
Luhone - Art Minigame Contributions!
Niah - Art Minigame Contributions!
Tuckie - Art Minigame Contributions!

Their twitters and websites are all linked! Check 'em out!

Gamepads are not supported yet, but all keys are easily linked through Joytokey!
